item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MotoPress Hotel Booking Lite plugin <=Â 4.6.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-29914|2024-08-02T01:17:58.593Z -- motopress -- stratum
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MotoPress Stratum allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Stratum: from n/a through 1.3.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-39630|2024-08-01T20:38:48.944Z -- motopress -- timetable%20and%20event%20schedule
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in MotoPress Timetable and Event Schedule allows Object Injection.This issue affects Timetable and Event Schedule: from n/a through 2.4.13.
